topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Using Stacks

body.p: A collection of resources created and managed using the Orchestration (Heat) service is called a service (also known as a stack).

Service resources can be flavors, images, instances, tenant networks, volumes, security groups, users, floating IP addresses, or any other entities defined and configured in templates. Most types of resources offered by HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade can be defined in templates and included in services.
